#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  //Log_info("--IN PUT--");
  //cout<<"STARTING PUT"<<to_string(oid)<<endl;
  operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] = KV_TIMEOUT;
  bool isLeader = false;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  this->GetRaftServer().GetState(&isLeader, &term);
  if(!isLeader) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  //cout<<"***PUT---OID IS---"<<to_string(oid)<<" key  is "<<k<<" value is "<<v<<endl;
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  uint64_t index = 0;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallableObject = s;
  this->GetRaftServer().Start(marshallableObject, &index ,&term);
  Coroutine::Sleep(900000);
  // if (keyToValueMapping.find(k) == keyToValueMapping.end() || keyToValueMapping[k].compare(v) != 0) {
  //   cout<<"Key not found in map for PUT FUNCTION"<<endl;
  //   return KV_SUCCESS;
  // } else {
  //   cout<<"Key found in map for PUT FUNCTION"<<endl;
  //   return KV_SUCCESS;
  // }
  
  if (operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] == KV_TIMEOUT) {
    cout<<"***PUT---Operation "<<to_string(oid)<<" gave timeout"<<endl;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  cout<<"***PUT---Operation "<<to_string(oid)<<" was successful"<<endl;
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  //Log_info("--IN APPEND--");
  operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] = KV_TIMEOUT;
  bool isLeader = false;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  this->GetRaftServer().GetState(&isLeader, &term);
  if(!isLeader) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  uint64_t index = 0;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallableObject = s;
  this->GetRaftServer().Start(marshallableObject, &index ,&term);
  Coroutine::Sleep(900000);
  if (operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] == KV_TIMEOUT) {
    cout<<"***APPEND---Operation "<<to_string(oid)<<" gave timeout"<<endl;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  //cout<<"***APPEND---Operation "<<to_string(oid)<<" was successful"<<endl;
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  //Log_info("--IN GET--");
  
  operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] = KV_TIMEOUT;
  bool isLeader = false;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  this->GetRaftServer().GetState(&isLeader, &term);
  if(!isLeader) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back("0");
  uint64_t index = 0;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallableObject = s;
  this->GetRaftServer().Start(marshallableObject, &index ,&term);
  Coroutine::Sleep(500000);
  if (operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] != KV_TIMEOUT) {
    cout<<"GET SUCCESSS FOR - "<<to_string(oid)<<endl;
    //cout<<" ANS IS "<<keyToValueMapping[k]<<endl;
    *v = keyToValueMapping[k];
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  } else {
    cout<<"GET TIMEOUTT FOR - "<<to_string(oid)<<endl;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
}



void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  //Log_info("--IN on nextcommand--");
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  string oid = v->data_.at(0);
  string operation = v->data_.at(1);
  string key = v->data_.at(2);
  string val = v->data_.at(3);
  operationToStatusMapping[oid] = KV_SUCCESS;
  //cout<<" VAL FOR REELECTION KEY IS "<<keyToValueMapping["reelection"]<<endl;
  cout<<"---OPID--"<<oid<<"--operation--"<<operation<<"---KEY---"<<key<<"---value---"<<val<<endl;
  if (operation.compare("put") == 0) {
    keyToValueMapping[key] = val;
  } else if (operation.compare("append") == 0) {
    if (keyToValueMapping.find(key) == keyToValueMapping.end()) {
      keyToValueMapping[key] = val;
    } else {
      keyToValueMapping[key] += val;
    }
  }
  //cout<<" VAL FOR REELECTION KEY IS "<<keyToValueMapping["reelection"]<<endl;
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
